A mapping between the FHIR and V3 AddressUse Code systems


Source CodeEquivalenceDestination CodeComments
homeequivalentH (home address)
homeequivalentH (home address)
workequivalentWP (work place)
tempequivalentTMP (temporary address)
olddisjointBAD (bad address)In the V3 AD, old is handled by the usablePeriod element, but you have to provide a time, there's no simple equivalent of flagging an address as old

resource.name: FHIR/v3 Address Use Mapping
resource.description: A mapping between the FHIR and V3 AddressUse Code systems

map.comments: In the V3 AD, old is handled by the usablePeriod element, but you have to provide a time, there's no simple equivalent of flagging an address as old

ACNE (Tissue, Acne)EQUIVALENT309068002 (Skin lesion sample)

AUTP (Autopsy)UNMATCHEDThis really is not a specimen per se - it is the state of the subject from whom the specimen is collected, so it should be used as a specimen type modifier ONLY!. Often this is indicated with a special medical record number or other notation on the patient. needs to have specimen type (SPM-4) and source site (SPM.8) and spatial orientation (SPM.9)

Do not just swab the reddened area - that will just collect skin flora

resource.name: Specimen mapping from v2 table 0487 to SNOMED CT

map.comments: HL7 term is a historical term. mapped to Pus

This really is not a specimen per se - it is the state of the subject from whom the specimen is collected, so it should be used as a  specimen type modifier ONLY!. Often this is indicated with a special medical record number or other notation on the patient. needs to have specimen type (SPM-4) and source site (SPM.8) and spatial orientation (SPM.9)
